Method Detail

isPlaying

public boolean isPlaying()
Returns:
Whether or not the clip is playing.

play

public Audio play()
Plays the clip. If it is already playing, it will restart. If the clip is paused, it will continue.

Returns:
the audio file.

togglePause

public Audio togglePause()
Plays the clip if it is paused, pauses it if it is not paused.

Returns:
the audio file.

toggleStop

public Audio toggleStop()
Plays the clip if it is stopped, stops it if it is not stopped.

Returns:
the audio file.

isPaused

public boolean isPaused()
Returns:
Whether or not the clip is paused.

pause

public Audio pause()
Pauses the clip. Reversible by play().

Returns:
the audio file.

isStopped

public boolean isStopped()
Returns:
Whether or not the clip is stopped.

stop

public Audio stop()
Stops the clip.

Returns:
the audio file.

getVolume

public float getVolume()
Returns:
The volume of the clip.

setVolume

public Audio setVolume(float vol)
Sets the volume of the clip.

Parameters:
vol - A floating point volume value, 0.8 being 80%, 1.5 being 150%, etc.
Returns:
the audio file.

getAudio

public static Audio getAudio(java.nio.IntBuffer buffer)
Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.

Parameters:
buffer - The integer buffer of the sound for OpenAL to process.
Returns:
the audio file.

getAudio

public static Audio getAudio(java.io.InputStream is,
                             java.lang.String format)
Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.

Parameters:
is - The input file to be read.
format - The format of the audio file ("wav", "ogg"...).
Returns:
the audio file.

getOGGBuffer

public static java.nio.IntBuffer getOGGBuffer(java.io.InputStream is)
Forms a buffer from is.

Parameters:
is - The stream to the sound file.
Returns:
The integer buffer for OpenAL based off of the .ogg file at the InputStream is.
